verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Wonderful Savior, wonderful Savior, newline Thou art so near, so precious to me! newline Wonderful Savior, wonderful Savior newline My heart is filled with praises to Thee.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Jesus, my King, my wonderful Savior, newline All of my life is given to Thee. newline I am rejoicing in Thy salvation. newline Thy precious blood now maketh me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Freedom from sin, O wonderful story! newline All of its stains washed whiter than snow! newline Jesus has come to live in His temple, newline And with His love my heart is aglow.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Jesus, my Lord, I'll ever adore Thee, newline Lay at Thy feet my treasures of love. newline Lead me in ways to show forth Thy glory, newline Ways that will end in heaven above.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: When in that bright and beautiful city newline I shall behold Thy glories untold, newline I shall be like Thee, wonderful Savior, newline And I will sing while ages unfold.
